content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and block dictionary to provide the assembly instructions:

Target Structure Analysis:
- Total blocks: 12
- Layers: 2-3 layers depending on the section
- Colors used: Red, Blue, Green, Yellow
- Two main sections with different configurations

Block Selection from Dictionary:
1. Red Arch Block (Index 1/2): Used for base arch section
2. Blue Cube Block (Index 4): Vertical support
3. Green Cube Block (Index 5/9): Vertical supports
4. Red Cube Block (Index 6/7): Vertical supports
5. Yellow Long Block (Index 12/13): Horizontal top layers
6. Yellow Half-Cylinder Block (Index 14): Curved top element
7. Yellow Short Block (Index 15/16): Base and top layers

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1 (Red Arch)
    Step2: Move block with index 1 (Red Arch)
    Step3: Move block with index 5 (Green Cube)
    Step4: Move block with index 6 (Red Cube)
    Step5: Move block with index 4 (Blue Cube)
    Step6: Move block with index 9 (Green Cube)
    Step7: Move block with index 7 (Red Cube)
    Step8: Move block with index 12 (Yellow Long Block)
    Step9: Move block with index 13 (Yellow Long Block)
    Step10: Move block with index 14 (Yellow Half-Cylinder)
    Step11: Move block with index 15 (Yellow Short Block)
    Step12: Move block with index 16 (Yellow Short Block)
}
